cards.name: Sansa's Maid
cards.text: Bestow (3). Each Lady character you control gets +1 STR for each gold Sansa's Maid has.

cards.name: Northern Keep
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Northern Keep to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed.)

cards.name: Highgarden Minstrel
cards.text: Reaction: After you play a Song event, gain 1 gold. (Limit 3 times per round.)

cards.name: Horn Hill
cards.text: Bestow (3). Challenges Action: Kneel Horn Hill to give each participating [tyrell] character you control +X STR until the end of the challenge. X is the number of gold Horn Hill has.

cards.name: Donal Noye
cards.text: Bestow (3). No attachments except Weapon. Action: Discard 1 gold from Donal Noye to put a Weapon attachment into play from your hand.

cards.name: Ranger's Bow
cards.text: [thenightswatch] character only. Attached character gets +1 STR. Challenges Action: Kneel Ranger's Bow to choose a defending [thenightswatch] character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.

cards.name: Patchface
cards.text: While another Fool character has a keyword, Patchface gains that keyword. While another Fool character has a challenge icon, Patchface gains that challenge icon.

cards.name: King's Blood
cards.text: Bastard or King character you control only. Bestow (3). Plot Action: Kneel attached character and sacrifice King's Blood to discard X power from each opponent's faction card. X is the number of gold King's Blood has.

cards.name: Genna Frey
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Genna Frey is attacking, if it was the third challenge you initiated this phase, the losing opponent discards 1 card at random from his or her hand. (2 cards instead if you control another attacking House Frey character.)

cards.name: The Goldroad
cards.text: Limited. Challenges Action: Kneel The Goldroad to gain 1 gold. +1 Income.

cards.name: Stony Shore Raider
cards.text: Bestow (3). Action: Discard 1 gold from Stony Shore Raider to choose and kneel a location with printed cost 3 or lower. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Pay The Iron Price
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose an attachment in an opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, pay 1 gold to return Pay The Iron Price from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Freedmen
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, put Freedmen into play from your discard pile.

cards.name: Warrior's Braid
cards.text: [targaryen] character only. Attached character gains renown, and gets +1 STR for each bell token on Warrior's Braid. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which attached character is attacking, place a bell token on Warrior's Braid.

cards.name: Dornish Spy
cards.text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After Dornish Spy enters play, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice.

cards.name: Locked Away
cards.text: Terminal. Reaction: After the marshaling phase begins, return attached character to its owner's hand (cannot be saved).

cards.name: Beric Dondarrion
cards.text: Renown. X is the number of kiss tokens Beric Dondarrion has. Forced Reaction: After you marshal Beric Dondarrion, place 6 kiss tokens on him. (Cannot be canceled.) Interrupt: When Beric Dondarrion would be killed, discard a kiss token from him to save him.

cards.name: Unbridled Generosity
cards.text: Action: Choose up to 3 cards. Move 1 gold from the treasury to each of those cards.

cards.name: The Brotherhood Without Banners
cards.text: You cannot include loyal characters in your deck. Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, kneel your faction card to choose a neutral character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains (choose one): insight, intimidate, renown, or stealth.

cards.name: Favors From the Crown
cards.text: Reaction: After a card with bestow enters play, place 1 gold from the treasury on that card. (2 gold instead if that card has 3 or more gold on it.)
